price: Njima pripada udio koji su zaslužili! Allah doista brzo sviđa račune.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ulāika lahum naṣībun mimmā kasabū wal-lahu sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
